author: Mark Whicker
title: CFP National Championship: Georgia fans anxious about the onrushing Tide

sentence: The Bulldogs (14-1) hadnt won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.
title: Georgia snaps 41-year title drought with 33-18 win over Alabama

sentence: The Bulldogs (14-1) hadnt won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.
author: Ralph D. Russo | Associated Press
title: Georgia wins first national title in 41 years, beating Alabama 33-18

sentence: It was Georgia's first national title since 1981, when Herschel Walker and the Bulldogs capped their undefeated season with a 17-10 victory over Notre Dame in the Sugar Bowl.
author: Nancy Armour
title: Georgia shows off Bulldog mentality in beating Alabama for first title since 1980

sentence: The Bulldogs (14-1) hadn't won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.
title: Georgia Bulldogs win first college football national title since 1980, beat defending champ and longtime nemesis Alabama 33-18
